scripts.dev: npx prisma db push && concurrently -k -n "SERVER,CLIENT,LAUNCH,LOGS" -c "blue,green,magenta,yellow" "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client" "node tools/dev_launcher.js" "powershell -File tools/log_aggregator.ps1"
scripts.dev:server: nodemon --watch src/server --watch src/shared -e ts,json --exec "ts-node src/server/index.ts" > logs_server.txt 2>&1
scripts.build: npx prisma generate && npm run build:client && npm run build:server && mkdir -p dist-server/public && cp -r dist-client/. dist-server/public/ && mkdir -p dist-server/generated && cp -r src/generated/. dist-server/generated/
scripts.start:prod: npx prisma migrate deploy && node dist-server/server/index.js
